00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : UpdateG
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00012 
00013 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00027 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028 
00029  SUBROUTINE UpdateG
00030 
00031 ! Common Variables
00032  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00033  USE Domain,    ONLY : ni_f, xmax, xmax_f, xmin, xmin_f, ymax, ymax_f, ymin, ymin_f
00034  USE FluidParams
00035  IMPLICIT NONE
00036 
00037 ! Local Variables
00038  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00039  INTEGER :: xs, ys
00040  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoSqX_f, gradRhoSqY_f
00041  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoXX2_f, gradRhoXY2_f, gradRhoYX2_f, gradRhoYY2_f
00042 
00043 
00044 ! Square of the density gradient (components and full)
00045  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00046    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00047      gradRhoXX_f(i,j) = gradRhoX_f(i,j)*gradRhoX_f(i,j)
00048      gradRhoXY_f(i,j) = gradRhoX_f(i,j)*gradRhoY_f(i,j)
00049      gradRhoYY_f(i,j) = gradRhoY_f(i,j)*gradRhoY_f(i,j)
00050      gradRhoSq_f(i,j) = gradRhoXX_f(i,j) + gradRhoYY_f(i,j)
00051    END DO
00052  END DO
00053 
00054 !--------- Interpolate the density in the pressure/momentum mesh ---------------
00055  DO j = ymin, ymax
00056    DO i = xmin, xmax
00057 
00058 ! Relative positions of the source and target nodes
00059      xs = 2*i - 1
00060      ys = 2*j - 1
00061 
00062 ! Identify first neighbors
00063      ie = ni_f(xs,ys,1)
00064      jn = ni_f(xs,ys,2)
00065      iw = ni_f(xs,ys,3)
00066      js = ni_f(xs,ys,4)
00067 
00068 ! Gradient of the square of the density gradient
00069      gradRhoSqX_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq_f(ie,ys) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,ys) ) &
00070                   + gradRhoSq_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,js)          &
00071                   + gradRhoSq_f(ie,js) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,jn)
00072 
00073      gradRhoSqY_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq_f(xs,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(xs,js) ) &
00074                   + gradRhoSq_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(iw,js)          &
00075                   + gradRhoSq_f(iw,jn) - gradRhoSq_f(ie,js)
00076 
00077 ! Second derivatives of rho
00078      gradRhoXX2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoXX_f(ie,ys) - gradRhoXX_f(iw,ys) ) &
00079                   + gradRhoXX_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoXX_f(iw,js)          &
00080                   + gradRhoXX_f(ie,js) - gradRhoXX_f(iw,jn)
00081 
00082      gradRhoXY2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY_f(xs,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(xs,js) ) &
00083                   + gradRhoXY_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,js)          &
00084                   + gradRhoXY_f(iw,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(ie,js)
00085 
00086      gradRhoYX2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY_f(ie,ys) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,ys) ) &
00087                   + gradRhoXY_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,js)          &
00088                   + gradRhoXY_f(ie,js) - gradRhoXY_f(iw,jn)
00089 
00090      gradRhoYY2_f = 4.D0*( gradRhoYY_f(xs,jn) - gradRhoYY_f(xs,js) ) &
00091                   + gradRhoYY_f(ie,jn) - gradRhoYY_f(iw,js)          &
00092                   + gradRhoYY_f(iw,jn) - gradRhoYY_f(ie,js)
00093 
00094 ! Arrays necessary in preStream and postStream
00095      GX(i,j) = kappaEf*( gradRhoSqX_f - gradRhoXX2_f - gradRhoXY2_f )
00096      GY(i,j) = kappaEf*( gradRhoSqY_f - gradRhoYX2_f - gradRhoYY2_f )
00097 
00098 ! Copy the value of rho from the overlapping f-mesh nodes
00099      rho(i,j) = rho_f(xs,ys)
00100 
00101 ! Copy values of the gradient of rho from the overlapping f-mesh nodes
00102      gradRhoX(i,j) = 2.D0*gradRhoX_f(xs,ys)
00103      gradRhoY(i,j) = 2.D0*gradRhoY_f(xs,ys)
00104 
00105    END DO
00106  END DO
00107 
00108  RETURN
00109  END SUBROUTINE UpdateG
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:02:43 2008 for LL-2D-DGR by  1.5.6
